description: A second screen is just a USB connection away.Adding a second screen is now as easy as adding the Kensington Universal Multi-Display Adapter. Multiple monitors are not just for traders and graphic designers.  They allow anyone to work more effectively and manage their workspace. In fact, research has shown that those adding multiple screens increased productivity by 42%*. And the Universal Multi-Display Adapter does it all in high resolution.•    Add up to six additional monitors/Adapters through a single USB connection•    Connect up to six adapters** to your computer directly or through a USB hub•    Works with projectors too--simply connect the adapter to your notebook and the projector will automatically display your screen•    Supports DVI or VGA video output with resolution up to 2048 x 1152 pixelsCompatibility: PC and Mac compatible including Windows® XP (sp2, sp3, including Tablet PC editions), Windows Vista® sp1 (32-bit and 64-bit editions) or later. Mac OS X® 10.4.11 and Mac OS X 10.5.5. Intel-based Apple® computers including Mac® Mini (Intel), iMac® (Intel), MacBook®, MacBook® Pro, MacBook Air®, and Mac ProKensington docks & multi-display adapter are compatible with Windows 7. If needed, updated drivers can be downloaded at http://us.kensington.com/html/12118.htmlSupports:Widescreen displays up to 2048 x 1152 pixels and standard displays up to 1600 x 1200.  A single computer can connect to a maximum of six Universal Multi-Display Adapters.**Video Output:DVH (female connector) or VGA (female connector)Video Modes: Mirrored desktop, extended desktop, primary display.Video cable not included*Source: Jon Peddie Research**Certain computers may restrict the number of adapters to 3
title: Kensington Universal Multi-Display Adapter (Black)
